title: Stoneridge Wholesale Division, LLC Recalls Pork Tenderloin Product Due To Misbranding And Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, Mar. 18, 2015 StoneRidge Wholesale Division, LLC, a Wautoma, Wis. establishment, is recalling approximately 31,851 pounds of pork tenderloin products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain milk, a...
